name: Miminc. Extermination
description:
Being part of Miminc. is not an easy job, you may think you're alone, but you have some mimics  to exterminate. In this prop hunt game, you must stay alert at all times to catch the mimics hidden around the house. They only move when you're not looking, so be sure to not mistake them with regular old objects! Furniture is shockingly expensive in this day and age.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2.

Theme: You're not alone

Art and music: Shim Shei https://linktr.ee/shim_shei

Code, sound design and additional art: Mattheenstra https://twitter.com/mattheenstra
